actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property located in Jefferson County, Ala., to the board of trustees of the University of Alabama.

summary.text: Provides for the conveyance of specified mineral interests of the United States in property located in Jefferson County, Alabama, to the board of trustees of the University of Alabama.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property located in Jefferson County, Ala., to the board of trustees of the University of Alabama.
